name: Camel Evolution |Ride,Race and Survive Wild Desert
name_original: Camel Evolution |Ride,Race and Survive Wild Desert
description:
The best evolutionary series in history has come out！Oh yeah！Welcome to download Camel Evolution——farm animal evolution games that are sweeping the world. Bursting with popularity,and so much that one cannot bear to part with it！
The environment of the human world has been destroyed and polluted to a great extent.The leak of radiation has a special effect on camels⋯⋯
When the first strange camel was born, everything began to get out of hand......
Evolution! Strange, lovely, adorable, ugly creatures emerge in endlessly.
When scientists are beyond control, the fate of the world will be in your hands!
~~~~~~~~
Example
~~~~~~~~
?Bring two of the same kind of camels together to produce new creatures.
?Use gold coins to buy new kinds of camels or all kinds of magical props.
?Don't forget to keep clicking on the camel, it will increase your gold coins.
?Condor can help you help you collect coins when mobile phone shutdown.
?Magnets can help you automatically merge camels.
?Apple has a wonderful effect. Don't forget to eat it.
?All sorts of wonderful functions are waiting for you to dig.
~~~~~~~~
Game features
~~~~~~~~
?Five scenes, dozens of camel species.
?A collection of animal evolution characteristics of 2048 popular, and click on the game.
?Different endings, possibilities, find your own only camel world.
?Lovely decorative scene, give your animals a hat.
?Mysterious alien scenes explore uncharted outer space.

Here is a virtual camel world, and think of yourself as king of the world!
